gui.components.macro
Class Graph_

java.lang.Object
  gui.components.Component_
      gui.components.rectangles.RectangleComponent_
          gui.components.rectangles.ComponentContainer_
              gui.components.macro.Graph_
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component_I, Interactive_I
Direct Known Subclasses:
GanttGraph_, GeoGraph_, TSPGraph_
public abstract class Graph_
extends ComponentContainer_
implements Interactive_I

root of the AST the Graph contains all components of a 2D graphic

Get the x-value of a pixel in the graph

Parameters:
pix - x pixel relative to the graph
c - target component
